ideas.title: Amazon’s new Alexa+ feature adds conversational AI to Ring doorbells
ideas.description: Amazon said that the feature uses the Ring doorbell's video descriptions to determine who the person in front the camera is based on their uniform, actions, and what they are holding.
hooks: 5 Mind-Blowing Ways Alexa+ Is Revolutionizing Home Security
Ring Doorbells Just Got Smarter: Here's How
